title: Ewing 80A 4-in-1 32Bit ESC - AM32
description: The Ewing Aerospace 80A 4-in-1 32Bit ESC is a high-current electronic speed controller designed for demanding multirotor and UAS applications. Engineered and manufactured in the USA, it features AM32 firmware, advanced telemetry support, and robust power handling for professional and government-compliant platforms.
